action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo 'apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: uptickdeployment
  labels:
    app: uptick
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: uptick
      tier: node
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: uptick
        tier: node
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sypen/uptick-node:1.0.0
        name: uptick-node
        ports:
        - containerPort: 30001
          name: uptick-node
' | tee Uptick-Node.yaml

kubectl create -f Uptick-Node.yaml

#!/bin/bash

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: uptick-node
  labels:
    app: uptick
spec:
  ports:
    - port: 30001
      nodePort: 30001
  selector:
    app: uptick
    tier: node
  type: NodePort
' | tee uptick-node-svc.yaml

kubectl create -f uptick-node-svc.yaml

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

kubectl delete -f Uptick-Node.yaml
kubectl delete -f uptick-node-svc.yaml
rm -rf Uptick-Node.yaml
rm -rf uptick-node-svc.yaml

action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

attrs.script:
x#!/bin/bash

echo 'apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: upticknginxdeployment
  labels:
    app: uptick
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: uptick
      tier: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: uptick
        tier: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sypen/uptick-nginx:1.0.0
        name: uptick-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: uptick-node
' | tee Uptick-nginx.yaml

kubectl create -f Uptick-nginx.yaml

#!/bin/bash

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: uptick-nginx
  labels:
    app: uptick
spec:
  ports:
    - port: 80
      nodePort: 30000
  selector:
    app: uptick
    tier: nginx
  type: NodePort
' | tee uptick-nginx-svc.yaml

kubectl create -f uptick-nginx-svc.yaml
